page.title: 11 ISLAND HALL
page.content: The Island Hall is Sark's Leisure Centre!There are clubs and orginisations,Theatre Group,Youth club,Thursday club,Play group,library,to name a few held there.The caretaker is Mrs. Betty Guille. Sark has two flower shows,Midsummer and Grand Autumn;these are held over two days. You can also play snooker,pool, badminton,euchre and beetle there. Thursday club,Whynot club,and the Professer Saint Fund hold jumble sales there. The Sark Theatre Group hold their annual play there. The Music society hold concerts there.The hall has a shop,tearoom,main hall,table tennis room and snooker rooIt opens at 10.00am and shuts at 10.00pm.
